src_original: nāsti sā guruparicaryā yānnābhyupagacchati /  nāsti sā santatiryānnābhyupagacchati /  nāsti sā kāyotpīḍā yānnābhyupagacchati /
tgt_original: 布施之時，謙下卑言，所可放施，不懷悔恨，身心不惱；

src_original: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā /  prītataro bhavatyekadharmapadaśravaṇena samyaksaṃbuddhopanītena bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakena  na sarvaśakratva[-māratva-]brahmatva-lokapālatva-cakravartitva-samucchrayapratilambhaiḥ /
tgt_original: 其有受者，因是令度，所不聞法，聞之欣然，勝得三千大千國土滿中珍寶，寧聞一偈不用梵釋轉輪王位，修無央數百千劫行；

src_original: evamahamidaṃ [dharmapadaṃ] samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakaṃ  te 'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti /  śrutvāsyaivaṃ bhavet /
tgt_original: 『卿今所興習，是平等正覺之業，菩薩淨行，假欲得聞此大正法，自投大火，更無極苦苦惱之患；

src_original: utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām
tgt_original: 越斯大火，若使己身，遭是困厄，乃成佛道。 』即念言：
